data.body: Create server-side directory listing module at src/lib/browse.ts. Functions: listDirectory(path) returns DirEntry[] with isBeadsRepo flag, getParentPath. Filters hidden dirs, handles permission errors, checks for .beads/ child.
data.description: Create server-side directory listing module at src/lib/browse.ts. Functions: listDirectory(path) returns DirEntry[] with isBeadsRepo flag, getParentPath. Filters hidden dirs, handles permission errors, checks for .beads/ child.
data.title: Directory browser logic (src/lib/browse.ts)
